about_the_game:
At a pivotal turning point in David’s life, he finds himself pulled into a dying world. Here people claim he is the key to their salvation. But David can’t even figure out his own mess, how can he be the savior of others? All he wants to do it get home and salvage what’s left of his figuratively crumbling world. Meanwhile, the people here desperately need him to literally save theirs. Of course, these choices may not be as mutually exclusive as he thinks. It’s up to him to find out what he’s truly made of.

Travel with David as he journeys across the fantastical world of Xtensia to try to find a way back to his home. David will have to overcome many obstacles, enemies, and even confront his own demons in order to make his way. But he will not be alone. Multiple companions and a varied cast will be there to aid David on his quest. Whether that quest is just to get home, or to save two dying worlds is up to you.

Save the world, save yourself

content_descriptors.notes: There are some bleak outlooks in small parts of the game. One of which includes an attempt of suicide by a character.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: The Day the World Stopped is a turn based RPG with a few added mechanics to help spice up the genre. Including, timed attacks, burst combos, multiple puzzles, four playable characters, and more!
